definition: acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]
gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: The mode of action of V-type organophosphate poisons on acetylcholinesterase has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了V类毒剂与乙酰胆碱酯酶的作用方式。

sentences.english: It has been found to be an inhibitor of the enzyme acetylcholinesterase.
sentences.chinese: 它已被认为是抑制乙酰胆碱酯酶的酶。

sentences.english: Infants in the non-acetylcholine receptor antibodies, its pathogenesis and heredity.
sentences.chinese: 病婴中无乙酰胆碱受体抗体，其发病机制与遗传有关。

sentences.english: These drugs are known as anticholinergic agents and are designed to block acetylcholine.
sentences.chinese: 这些药物被称为抗胆碱能制剂和旨在阻止乙酰胆碱。

sentences.english: Stimulation of acetylcholine receptor with agonists can modulate immunity ability.
sentences.chinese: 激活后的乙酰胆碱受体参与淋巴细胞的免疫调节。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference between the two strains in sensitivity of acetylcholinesterase to insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 两种群乙酰胆碱酯酶对杀虫剂敏感性没有显著差异。

sentences.english: The brain uses it to make the neurotransmitter acetylcholine.
sentences.chinese: 大脑利用这种物质生成神经递质的乙酰胆碱。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
